name: Gangster Kid Target Shooting - Best Target Shooting Game in HD
name_original: Gangster Kid Target Shooting - Best Target Shooting Game in HD
description:
Gangster Kid Target Shooting - The latest Gangster Shooting Game!

Gangster Kid Target Shooting let you play as a little gangster boy who practice target shooting. Shoot poker chips, milk bottles and different items to be the best new little gangster in town! This skeet/target shooting game will let you play target shooting for hours. The difficulty will increase on each level. Be careful to not shoot the bombs. Beat your friends or your own score !

Features of Gangster Kid Target Shooting:
- Easy one touch target shooting for the gangster in you!
- 7 different type of targets to shoot and destroy
- Random bombs
- Easy target and hard one
- Beautiful theme and fun sound effects
- Infinite level
- Beat your own score

Are you ready to be the best new gangster shooter? Download and play Gangster Kid Target Shooting now!
